author: cnbc.com
title: Church & Dwight to Report First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
EWING, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Church & Dwight Co., Inc. (NYSE:CHD) will host a conference call to discuss first quarter 2018 earnings results on May 3, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern time.
To participate, dial 877-322-9846 within the U.S. and Canada, or 631-291-4539 internationally, using access code 6878049. A replay will be available at 855-859-2056 using the same access code. You also can participate via webcast by visiting the Investor Relations section of the Companyâ€™s website.
Church & Dwight Co., Inc. manufactures and markets a wide range of personal care, household and specialty products under the ARM & HAMMER brand name and other well-known trademarks.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180330005240/en/
Church & Dwight Co., Inc.
Rick Dierker, 609-806-1900
Source: Church & Dwight Co., Inc.
